name: Forest Picnic Blanket
description: [Carpet] So much food. Which should I eat first? Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

description: [Carpet] Someone once said that a biscuit that doesn't want to be a chess board is not a good carpet. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Deluxe Lattice Window
description: [Window] The view outside the window is the same as a year ago, but it feels more beautiful now with the luxurious-looking silk curtains. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Family Photo
description: [Wall Decor] A photo of a happy couple and a cat. Who wouldn't want this kind of life? Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Ceremonial Chandelier
description: [Wall Decor] The magic-infused chandelier emits a soft glow. Just being near it makes you feel relaxed. Increase Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Birthday Banner
description: [Wall Decor] "Happy Birthday!" It's a simple greeting but carries a lot of weight. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Birthday Flag
description: [Wall Decor] The future is still full of hope. Stand under the flag and make a victory sign. Let the wind take away the troubles of your past. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Kitten Egg
description: [Compact Item] How did a kitten hatch out of an egg? There must be magic at work! Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Ceremonial Round Table
description: [Compact Item] Forget about what your fitness instructor told you. Forget about losing weight. It's your birthday, so eat to your heart's content. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Birthday Cake
description: [Compact Item] No one would say no to a delicious cake. If they do, let them have two. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Hatching Lamp
description: [Compact Item] Have you ever felt the "brilliance of life"? If not, come closer. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Ceremonial Balloons
description: [Compact Item] Every balloon contains a child's dream. Handle it with care and keep it away from pointy objects. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Surprise Gift
description: [Compact Item] Every gift is a surprise, waiting for you to unwrap. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Champagne Barrel
description: [Bulky Item] This vintage wine came from a private collection in Holy Church. Carrying it here was a lot of hassle. Should have just gone for the barrels of soda next door. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Comfy Sofa
description: [Bulky Item] A very soft loveseat, greatly favored by Erina and the Black Cat! Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Elegant Long Table
description: [Bulky Item] People are sitting around the long table, talking about the past year with knowing smiles on their faces. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Pagoda Flooring
description: [Floor] Watch your step. The uneven floor can easily cause you to trip and fall spectacularly. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Mottled Wall
description: [Wall] Time has inflicted wear and tear on this mottled wall, but it can't erase evidence of its glorious past from its surface. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Ancient Wooden Floor
description: [Floor] It creaks when walked on. Makes you worried it will cave in at any moment. So tread lightly. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Lonely Window
description: [Window] A window completely boarded up with planks and nails. The view outside is blurry. Close inspection reveals that the nails are, surprisingly, made of sterling silver. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Cold Will-o'-the-wisp
description: [Wall Decor] A candle emitting a faint, strange glow. Instead of giving you warmth, it sends a chill down your spine. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Strange Cat Mural
description: [Wall Decor] Do not stare at this painting, or it will make you hallucinate and slowly lose your mind. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Inferno Flag
description: [Wall Decor] A strange liquid stains the otherwise glossy surface of the flag, the edges of which are torn by scratches. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Dormant Chair
description: [Compact Item] An unassuming chair with a cat fast asleep on it. Once you sit down on it, you will never wake up. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Sinister Coffin
description: [Compact Item] "Come on, open it..." It whispers to you as soon as you come close. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Horrid Clock
description: [Compact Item] What makes this thing creepy is that it constantly makes loud, strange sounds on its own—especially when people come near. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Giant Magic Hat
description: [Compact Item] A magic as tall as a person. It feels safe to hide in it, maybe. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Sleeping Statue
description: [Compact Item] A stone statue standing in the room. It has a hideous face and a grim stare. Looks like it is guarding something. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Escape Circle
description: [Carpet] A teleport circle exuding magic. There's no telling where it will take you if you stand on it. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Crowded Cupboard
description: [Bulky Item] A cupboard filled to the brim with all kinds of strange items. Better stay away from it. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Timeless Feast
description: [Bulky Item] A quaint serving of dinner that gives off a timeless charm. Ancient Castle exclusive. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Blasphemous Fireplace
description: [Bulky Item] "Why is there not a soul in sight...?" Ponders the demon sitting by the fireplace. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Grease-Proof Wallpaper
description: [Wall] This wallpaper is coated in a special material that makes it grease-proof. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Simple Flooring
description: [Flooring] A simple but graceful collage of tiles. Very much in vogue this year. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Quiet Afternoon
description: [Window] The warm sunlight lazily makes its way through the window. Shut your eyes for a nice nap. Increases Comfort by 20 when furnished.

name: Flow of Time
description: [Wall Decor] The past is frozen in pictures. The future washes over like a breeze. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Lingering Warmth
description: [Wall Decor] The sight of sumptuous food in warm lighting makes all your troubles go away. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: True Aim
description: [Wall Decor] If you can hit the bullseye five times in a row, your name will go on the restaurant brochure, and you will get a free drink. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Pixel Neko Ceiling
description: [Wall Decor] This kind of suspended ceiling is a common sight at restaurant bars, for they're cheap, practical, and easy to clean. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Soft Barstool
description: [Compact Item] Whenever you come by, there's always a spot reserved for you. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Tidal Music Box
description: [Compact Item] The primary mood setter in the restaurant! In the absence of music, it steps up to the plate. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Food Display Rack
description: [Compact Item] Laden with an assortment of fresh foods, each labeled with an expiration date and replaced regularly. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Bespoke Piano
description: [Compact Item] An expensive custom-made piano that can produce beautiful notes when played by skilled hands. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Potted Plants
description: [Compact Item] People like to put vibrant plants inside buildings to add a touch of nature. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Billboard
description: [Compact Item] The latest promotion package on offer at the restaurant. Cheap and delicious. Don't miss out! Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Restaurant Bar
description: [Bulky Item] A place where tears and laughter mingle. Whenever you want to get something off your chest, you can always find someone here who is willing to listen. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Intimate Bench
description: [Bulky Item] A bench and table commonly seen in restaurants. Kids love laying or standing on it. Maintenance work can be a hassle. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Spliced Wine Rack
description: [Bulky Item] This enormous wine cabinet can satisfy the need of all customers, from heavy spenders to those on budget. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.

name: Khaki Carpet
description: [Carpet] A khaki carpet was chosen so that coffee and wine stains won't stand out. Increases Comfort by 15 when furnished.
